pathAssistantSteps.info:
Revise techniques to increase future wins.

  • What contributed to losing this opportunity?
  • What do we need to do differently to improve our chances of winning?
  • Schedule a follow-up task to review this account at a future date.

Congratulations, you won the sale!

  • Ensure you have received all fully executed Contracts and have a Contact record linked to your Opportunity
  • If a CIM has not yet been added to the Opportunity Team, request one now
  • Ensure all relevant Account, Opportunity and Contract-Level Partnerships have been created
  • Ensure all known Product and Program data is entered accurately

You've initiated the contract process with the client.

  • Ensure all known program details are completed on the Opportunity and Opportunity Program(s), and notify Legal to prepare the Contract.
  • If you need a CIM assigned early (prior to contract close), check 'Request CIM' to trigger a special request.

Present the solution and understand the buying process.

  • Where are they in the buying cycle?
  • What is their process to generate purchase orders?
  • Who are the key decision makers? Have you added them to the opportunity?
  • How can you communicate the value of our solutions to the decision makers?
  • Have you quantified the ROI with the decision makers?
